about_the_game:
This DLC adds 4 successor chapters to the game.

  • Novamarines
  • Crimson Fists
  • Angels of Redemption
  • Flesh Tearers

Each of these are fully playable as separate chapter option in the game with identical traits as their parent chapter.
detailed_description:
This DLC adds 4 successor chapters to the game.

  • Novamarines
  • Crimson Fists
  • Angels of Redemption
  • Flesh Tearers

Each of these are fully playable as separate chapter option in the game with identical traits as their parent chapter.
